statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_id, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE last_visit_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE health_condition LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE health_condition LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, last_visit_date, health_condition FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, last_visit_date FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE risk_score > 50;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, prescription FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT Patients.name, HealthRecords.diagnosis, HealthRecords.treatment FROM Patients INNER JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.name, HealthRecords.diagnosis, HealthRecords.treatment, HealthRecords.prescription FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE HealthRecords.risk_score > 50;
SELECT Patients.name, HealthRecords.diagnosis, HealthRecords.treatment FROM Patients LEFT JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients;
SELECT gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'A+';
SELECT record_id, visit_date, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE doctor_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, gender, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND blood_type = 'A+';

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, h.risk_level FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN HealthRisks h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY h.risk_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT condition_name, risk_level FROM health_conditions ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 100 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT patients.patient_name, health_conditions.condition_name, patient_conditions.diagnosis_date FROM patients JOIN patient_conditions ON patients.patient_id = patient_conditions.patient_id JOIN health_conditions ON patient_conditions.condition_id = health_conditions.condition_id WHERE patient_conditions.diagnosis_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, patient_address, condition_name, risk_level, prevention FROM patients JOIN patient_conditions ON patients.patient_id = patient_conditions.patient_id JOIN health_conditions ON patient_conditions.condition_id = health_conditions.condition_id WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, blood_type, bmi FROM Patients WHERE bmi BETWEEN 18.5 AND 24.9;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC;
SELECT patient_id, risk_factor FROM HealthRisks WHERE risk_level = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords INNER JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, risk_factor FROM HealthRisks WHERE risk_level > 2 AND risk_factor LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT MAX(heart_rate), MIN(temperature) FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY record_id HAVING AVG(oxygen_saturation) > 95;
SELECT patient_id, measure_description FROM HealthRisks INNER JOIN PreventiveMeasures ON HealthRisks.risk_id = PreventiveMeasures.risk_id ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
